description:
The agency is holding a big concert, but it`s too late in the evening for U149 to perform. Have they missed their chance for their big debut?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akarui Toki wa Mienakute, Nemuru Toki ni Mieru Mono, Nani?
What Can`t Be Seen When It`s Bright out, but Can Be Seen When It`s Nighttime?
明るい時は見えなくて, 眠る時に見えるもの, なに?
